title: Gold Spent and Gold Earned Graphs Reversed?
body:
EDIT: Actually I'm a fool!! Some bars do seem accurate! But is this normal?

My mouse is not captured but it is pointing to the bottom bar. These bars show us spending more gold than we earned. I got to this screen by going to profile -> match history. I was on Twisted Treeline. Is this a mistake or what?

http://imgur.com/a/VL6KP

replies.body:
Hey Bimclunk! 

This is an intended representation of income in the client.  I would have to defer more to someone who works directly with the game systems on how the in-game interaction works, but what's reflected in the client is the delta of items purchased and actual gold earned.  

For example, if I go to the store and spend 50g on a potion, then I sell that potion back, then buy something else.  I don't calculate the sale price as earned gold, but I do count  both purchases in my spent column.  

This is a typical example of one way you could see greater spent than earned.
Selling an item doesn't count as "gold earned" but if you then buy something, it does count for "gold spent"
